pr_title: Support standard event source for remote validator

timeline.message: Introduce independent timer based validator events for remote validators.
Use independent timer automatically if websocket endpoint is not specified.
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into remote-validator-event-source
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into remote-validator-event-source

Fix NullPointerException.
Don't execute tasks if the delayed event runs slightly before it is due.
Don't default current epoch to zero, it may cause us to calculate duties from way too far back.
Move keep-alive thread to EventSourceBeaconChainEventAdapter since it's only needed when that's in use.
Add tests for handler and handle invalid messages.
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into remote-validator-event-source
